post.title: 3 months progress on my game engine
post.author: Hubert Klonowski
post.content:
Hi there!

Itâ€™s been 3 months since I started working on dBengine, and I wanted to share some updates.

ZTGK Challenge

Past two days I participated in the ZTGK Challenge, a game development competition organized by the Lodz University of Technology.

Me and my team decybels games created a game called Orpheus, a 3D hack 'n' slash game with a musical twist. More on that in the future...

dBengine

After the emotions and stress of the competition have passed, I put up a showcase site for dBengine, which you can find here!

It contains a list of features, an engine's history and more.

Please take a look and remember that it is still a work in progress, so some things may not work as expected. But fear not, I am constantly working on improvements!

A big thank you to everyone who has been actively helping in the development of dBengine, and until next time!

Hubert
